metadata.title: CVE-2022-25326 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: fscrypt through v0.3.2 creates a world-writable directory by default whensetting up a filesystem, allowing unprivileged users to exhaust filesystemspace. We recommend upgrading to fscrypt 0.3.3 or above and adjusting thepermissions on existing fscrypt metadata directories where applicable.

criterions.comment: fscrypt package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
